uk.ac.glasgow.etparser

Class ETParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.glasgow.etparser.ETParser

  • public class ETParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class parses a file into lines, keeps a list of event handlers and every time an event occurs it notifies them. It also prints a report of the percentage and kind of errors caused by attempt to access not born or dead objects.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Emi
